title: FindReferenceAssembliesForReferences accounts for 7% of a design-time build

nodes.body: This target is consuming the 5th most design-time build time in our new telemetry, with a 95% percentile time of 26 milliseconds.
@AndyAyersMS This would be a good one to pick up for your new guy.

Not sure I follow -- are you saying somebody should look at this from the jit's standpoint...? 

Either slow jitting or that the jitted code is slow?
Sorry, @AndyAyersMS meant to tag @AndyGerlicher. Nothing from a JIT'ed standpoint.
